channel.title: Charms and summoning
channel.description:
After a year spend in military I have now started to play runescape a little with my pure ranger and I have couple of questions.
First of all about this skill summoning.. Does it affect on my combat lvl at all? I have heard it would but Im not sure about it.
Secondly I have now gathered a lot of these charms. Are they any useful for me? Can I turn them into hard cold cash somehow? I know they are untradeable.
If someone could answer these two questions I would really be grateful.

item.title: Charms and summoning
item.dc:creator: @person1936 person1936
item.description:
@person1936 wrote:

Thug-life:

Yeah, summoning does raise your combat level. They raised the max level to 136 (Or something like that).

138

Read full topic

item.title: Charms and summoning
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

Then just drop 'em ignore the things and don’t collect more, simple.

Read full topic

item.title: Charms and summoning
item.dc:creator: @Algas Algas
item.description:
@Algas wrote:

[quote=“Taharok, post:19, topic:222240”]You can sell the shards, just not in the GE. And, if you don’t want to loose as much money while doing summoning, you can trade the pouches you make to some Ogre in Og’loog, and he will trade you 70% of the shards back you used to make that pouch, only if you are a certain number of levels higher than the required level to make that pouch.

Also, any familiars that are used to bank items will sell high on the GE. Any good effect familiars or strong familiars will also sell really good. Only the low level familiars that everyone uses to start gaining levels won’t sell good.[/quote]
Thats just the point. I will not fuck my pure up by gaining useless combat levels because of summoning…

Read full topic

item.title: Charms and summoning
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

You can sell the shards, just not in the GE. And, if you don’t want to loose as much money while doing summoning, you can trade the pouches you make to some Ogre in Og’loog, and he will trade you 70% of the shards back you used to make that pouch, only if you are a certain number of levels higher than the required level to make that pouch.

Also, any familiars that are used to bank items will sell high on the GE. Any good effect familiars or strong familiars will also sell really good. Only the low level familiars that everyone uses to start gaining levels won’t sell good.

Read full topic

item.title: Charms and summoning
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

Algas:

But is there anyway I could be able to turn my charms into profit or am I just gatherung them for nothing?

Yes you can turn them into cash problem being is you need certain summoning levels in order to make the pouches that sell. So you will spend money before you start making it.

Read full topic

item.title: Charms and summoning
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

Algas:

But is there anyway I could be able to turn my charms into profit or am I just gatherung them for nothing?

There is nothing to do with them BUT use them on the summoning skill to make pouches. So unless you don’t mind training summoning then there isn’t much you can do.

Read full topic

item.title: Charms and summoning
item.dc:creator: @Gromit Gromit
item.description:
@Gromit wrote:

Summoning isn’t as big of a money sink as it used to be now that you can trade pouches back for shards

Read full topic

item.title: Charms and summoning
item.dc:creator: @skiller_noob1 skiller noob1
item.description:
@skiller_noob1 wrote:

Algas, no Charms are untradable. And, people requesting pics I will be posting them when I get 99.

Read full topic

item.title: Charms and summoning
item.dc:creator: @Gotta_Catch_Them_All Gotta Catch Them All
item.description:
@Gotta_Catch_Them_All wrote:

nohope:

the first time i heard about summoning i thought it was a joke, 138?? That’s not runescape! the first day at the ge I saw a level 127 and it was weird but I liked it… But I wouldn’t summon because like pk4pk said it costs to much money. and it’s not smart because you may have uneeded cb lvls, if your pking and your lvl 70 another lvl 70 might 1 summoning so he has better stats then you. so you lose because you have 80 range he has 90.

Coherent sentences motherfucker. Those weren’t.

Read full topic

[/quote]
pics[/quote]Ye pics?

item.title: Charms and summoning
item.dc:creator: @pk4pk pk4pk
item.description:
@pk4pk wrote:

[quote=“goatee, post:8, topic:222240”][quote author=R.I.P RSC link=topic=291899.msg2351371#msg2351371 date=1217008472]
IIRC, you can sell the things you create at the altar to actually summon something. But I could be wrong, I’m not a member anymore.
[/quote]

You can but no body buys them. However you cant buy charms, you have to kill monsters for them. And shards and pouches are expensive.[/quote]
1pouch = 1gp amirite?

Read full topic

item.title: Charms and summoning
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

Yes summoning raises your combat just like prayer will do. I think if you get 99 summoning that is about 12 combat levels.

Summoning charms, as you said, can’t be traded for some faggot reason which means they are only useful for training summoning experience.

Thug-life:

They raised the max level to 136 (Or something like that).

Yeah its 138 now, it was so weird seeing people above level 126.

Read full topic

item.title: Charms and summoning
item.dc:creator: @pk4pk pk4pk
item.description:
@pk4pk wrote:

[quote=“Algas, post:3, topic:222240”][quote author=Thug-life link=topic=291899.msg2351320#msg2351320 date=1216991482]
Yeah, summoning does raise your combat level. They raised the max level to 136 (Or something like that).
[/quote]
Ok so being pure I definetly dont want to raise my summoning lvl.[/quote]
It’d be a waist of $ too, but this is what you should train, range and def. Even though it says your a range pure :s you’d get owned in bh.

Read full topic

After a year spend in military I have now started to play runescape a little with my pure ranger and I have couple of questions.

First of all about this skill summoning… Does it affect on my combat lvl at all? I have heard it would but Im not sure about it.
